facts.1: Sunglasses were first invented in China in the 12th century.
facts.2: The first sunglasses were made from flat panes of smoky quartz.
facts.3: Modern sunglasses were popularized by Sam Foster in 1929.

facts.1: PTSD affects approximately 3.5% of U.S. adults every year.
facts.2: Women are more likely to develop PTSD than men.
facts.3: PTSD can develop after experiencing or witnessing a traumatic event.

facts.1: Ice cream cakes became popular in the United States in the 19th century.
facts.2: The largest ice cream cake weighed over 12,000 pounds.
facts.3: Ice cream cakes are a popular choice for birthdays and celebrations.
